mapper.select: SELECT ingredient.id, ingredient.name, food_cat.name AS food_cat_name, IFNULL(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT allergy.name ORDER BY allergy.id SEPARATOR ' / '), 'no allergy') AS allergy_name, ingredient.created FROM ingredient LEFT JOIN ingredients_allergies ON ingredient.id = ingredients_allergies.ingredient_id LEFT JOIN allergy ON allergy.id = ingredients_allergies.allergy_id LEFT JOIN food_cat ON food_cat.id = ingredient.food_cat_id GROUP BY ingredient.id, ingredient.name, food_cat.name ORDER BY ingredient.id ASC;
SELECT ingredient.id, ingredient.name, ingredient.food_cat_id FROM ingredient ORDER BY ingredient.id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ingredient(name, kana, food_cat_id) VALUES(#{name}, #{kana}, #{foodCatId})
